function.name: search_pubmed
function.description: Search peer-reviewed clinical and biomedical research literature from Pubmed.

query.description: descriptive search query related to the biomedical sciences

function.name: search_arXiv
function.description: Search open-access articles in the fields of Physics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Quantitative Biology, Quantitative Finance, and Statistics.

query.description: descriptive search query related to the physical or computational sciences

function.name: search_clinical_trials
function.description: Search ClinicalTrials.gov to find current clinical trials being conducted or proposed.

query.description: descriptive search query for a clinical trial

function.name: search_wikipedia
function.description: Search Wikipedia for basic information about any concept or individual.

query.description: descriptive search query for wikipedia articles

function.name: search_us_patent_office
function.description: Search the US Patent & Trademark Office for granted patents.

query.description: descriptive search query for a filed or granted patent

function.name: search_internet
function.description: Search the internet for diverse content and resource URLs. Avoid use unless necessary.

function.name: search_neurips
function.description: Search the Neurips computer science conference proceedings.

query.description: descriptive search query for neurips journal proceeding articles

function.name: search_github
function.description: Search Github for code repositories and users.

function.name: search_academic_scholars
function.description: Search for the Google Scholar academic profile of human researchers.

query.description: the name of a research or academic scientist. You must ONLY provide the name, and no adjunct text, to this query input.
